node.text_zh:
反修例運動擴闊民主陣營抗爭路線，初選期間部分候選人以「讓本土派成為主流」為口號互相站台；有傳統泛民政黨候選人因而告急，初選結果可謂各路線支持者的大型民意調查。
本土及抗爭派候選人
港島：梁晃維 彭卓棋 袁嘉蔚
九西：馮達浚 劉澤鋒 張崑陽
九東：李嘉達 黃之鋒
新西：張可森 伍健偉 黃子悅
新東：鄒家成 劉頴匡 呂智恆 何桂藍 林景楠
超區：王百羽 岑敖暉
node.text_en:
The whole political movement has signficantly widened the political spectrum and conflicts in ideals/ approaches within the Pro-Democracy camp, specifically, the Localists and the Resistence Camp vs the other moderate Pro-Democracy Camp parties. As a result, many have regarded this primaries as a polling for the acceptance of the radical appraoch led by the Localists and the Resistence Camp.
Resistance & Localist Candidates
HKI: Fergus Leung, Michael Pang, Tiffany Yuen
KLW: Frankie Fung, Nathan Lau, Sunny Cheung
KLE: Kinda Li, Joshua Wong
NTW: Sam Cheung, Ng Kin Wai, Prince Wong
NTE: Owen Chow, Ventus Lau, Hendick Lui, Gwyneth Ho, Mike Lam
Super Seat: Henry Wong, Lester Shum

node.primary_description_zh: 本區所有候選人早前達成「約束力初選」共識，將由選民選出8位初選候選人中得票最高的6位參加官方選舉，落選的候選人將不會參加官方選舉。
node.primary_description_en: Pro-democracy camp is aiming for 4 seats in the official election and will send out 6 lists from the primaries. The results of the primaries is binding, any participant other than the top 6 vote-getterswill concede from the actual LegCo 2020 election.

node.primary_description_zh: 本區所有候選人早前達成「約束力初選」共識，將由選民選出12位初選候選人中得票最高的7位參加官方選舉，落選的候選人將不會參加官方選舉。
node.primary_description_en: Pro-democracy camp will send out 7 lists from the primaries. The results of the primaries is binding, any participant other than the top 7 vote-getters will concede from the actual LegCo 2020 election.

node.primary_description_zh: 本區所有候選人早前達成「初選加棄選」雙軌制共識，民主派以4席為目標，共9隊出戰初選，尚未決定初選出線名額及正式選舉名額。
node.primary_description_en: The results of the primaries is binding, meaning that any participant other than the top vote-getters will concede. Before the election in September, a polling will be conducted (HKPORI) and the least supported candidate(s) (number to be determined) will also concede.

node.primary_description_zh: 本區所有候選人早前達成「初選加棄選」雙軌制共識，民主派以3席為目標，共6隊出戰初選，出線名額為5隊（初選票數最低的名單退選）。選舉前夕，民調排名最後兩位的候選人需棄選。
node.primary_description_en: Pro-democracy camp is aiming for 3 seats in the official election and will send out 5 lists from the primaries. The results of the primaries is binding, meaning that any participant other than the top 5 vote-getters will concede.Before the election in September, a polling will be conducted by HKPORI and the least supported 2 candidates will also concede.

node.primary_rule_zh: 不具約束力初選加棄選
node.primary_description_zh: 本區候選人並沒有達成「約束力初選」共識，民主派以4席為目標，選舉前夕，民調排名較低的候選人需棄選。
node.primary_description_en: Pro-democracy camp is aiming for 4 seats in the official election and the primaries is non-binding, meaning that given whatever results, candidates can still continue to campaign for the actual election. Before the actual election in September, a polling will be conducted by the HKPORI and the least supported candidate(s) will concede from the actual election.

node.primary_description_zh: 本區所有候選人早前達成「約束力初選」共識，參選四人立場請參考《立場新聞》專訪。
node.primary_description_en: The results of the primaries is binding, meaning that any participant other than the top vote-getter will concede from the official election. This year, there are a total of 4 lists from the pro-democratic camp running for the councillor seat.

node.description_zh: 經常在警民衝突時於前線協助調停。集立法會議員、註冊社工、填詞人、作曲家、愛情小說作家一身。2016年以「票王」進軍立法會超區。
node.title_zh: 現任立法會議員、元朗區議員（北朗）
node.title_en: Current Legislative Councillor, Yuen Long DC Member (Pek Long)

node.description_zh: 2016年立法會新界西選舉中，於青年新政黃俊傑的名單排名第二。與支持港獨的陳澤滔組成「IT Vision」。
去年成為註冊社工，並開始在示威現場作支援，惟經歷721事件後令他決意成為議員，期望用更有力的身位指出政權不善。
正辦理放棄美國國籍的手續。傘後出任立法會議員朱凱廸助理。
1991年，以28歲之齡首度當選立法局議員，主權移交後亦多次連任立法會議員，是次為第9度參選。
node.title_zh: 現任立法會議員、油尖旺區議員（奧運）
node.title_en: Current Legislative Councillor, Yau Tsim Mong DC Member (Olympic)

assets.title: 2020 立法會選舉初選論壇（超級區議會）
assets.channel: 蘋果日報、立場新聞、D100及城寨
